20101225040119.000|20101225040120.000|CC1|SITUATION AND THE INMATES AS    
20101225040120.000|20101225040121.000|CC1|WELL.                           
20101225040121.000|20101225040123.000|CC1|>> WE WERE KILLING PEOPLE THAT  
20101225040123.000|20101225040124.000|CC1|DIDN'T DESERVE TO BE KILLED.    
20101225040124.000|20101225040133.000|CC1|>> THIS IS CALIFORNIA'S SAN     
20101225040133.000|20101225040137.000|CC1|QUENTIN STATE PRISON, ONE OF THE
20101225040137.000|20101225040139.000|CC1|FIRST PRISONS EVER PROFILED ON  
20101225040139.000|20101225040144.000|CC1|"LOCKUP."                       
20101225040144.000|20101225040145.000|CC1|>> FOR A PHOTOGRAPHER, SAN      
20101225040145.000|20101225040146.000|CC1|QUENTIN WAS A REALLY INTERESTING
20101225040146.000|20101225040150.000|CC1|PLACE TO SHOOT BECAUSE IT'S THE 
20101225040150.000|20101225040152.000|CC1|OLD-STYLE TIERS AND THE BIG     
20101225040152.000|20101225040153.000|CC1|EXERCISE YARD AND THERE'S A LOT 
20101225040153.000|20101225040154.000|CC1|OF CORNERS AND SHADOWS AND      
20101225040154.000|20101225040201.000|CC1|THINGS TO ATTRACT YOUR LENS.    
20101225040201.000|20101225040201.000|CC1|SO IT WAS JUST AS A             
20101225040201.000|20101225040202.000|CC1|PHOTOGRAPHER, IT WAS REALLY AN  
20101225040202.000|20101225040203.000|CC1|INTERESTING PLACE TO SHOOT.     
20101225040203.000|20101225040206.000|CC1|IT CAN BE A VERY DANGEROUS PLACE
20101225040206.000|20101225040208.000|CC1|BECAUSE IT'S GOT INCREDIBLY     
20101225040208.000|20101225040209.000|CC1|DANGEROUS, OR INFAMOUS HISTORY  
20101225040209.000|20101225040214.000|CC1|AS A DANGEROUS PLACE.           
20101225040214.000|20101225040216.000|CC1|>> ON OUR FIRST DAY OF SHOOTING 
20101225040216.000|20101225040217.000|CC1|HERE, WE GOT A STARK            
20101225040217.000|20101225040218.000|CC1|INTRODUCTION TO THE CONSTANT    
20101225040218.000|20101225040218.000|CC1|SECURITY THREATS POSED BY GANG  
20101225040218.000|20101225040224.000|CC1|ORDER.                          
20101225040224.000|20101225040226.000|CC1|>> WE'RE BASICALLY GETTING READY
20101225040226.000|20101225040227.000|CC1|TO FEED THE LEVEL FOUR, MAXIMUM 
20101225040227.000|20101225040228.000|CC1|SECURITY INMATES.

20101225040243.000|20101225040245.000|CC1|AT DINNER.

20101225040250.000|20101225040254.000|CC1|WHAT IS CALLED CLEANING HOUSE.  
20101225040254.000|20101225040257.000|CC1|ANYONE THAT DOES NOT WANT TO

20101225040303.000|20101225040307.000|CC1|THE RESULT IS BEING SLASHED AND 
20101225040307.000|20101225040311.000|CC1|IT'S USUALLY ACROSS THE FACE AND
20101225040311.000|20101225040314.000|CC1|THEY'RE MARKED FOR LIFE.        
20101225040314.000|20101225040316.000|CC1|>> IT DOESN'T MATTER HOW MUCH   
20101225040316.000|20101225040320.000|CC1|STAFF WE HAVE, THEY WILL ERUPT  
20101225040320.000|20101225040322.000|CC1|IF IT'S GOING TO.               
20101225040322.000|20101225040325.000|CC1|>> OUR CAMERAS ROLLED AS THE    
20101225040325.000|20101225040331.000|CC1|FIRST GROUP OF INMATES FILED    
20101225040331.000|20101225040334.000|CC1|INTO THE CHOW HALL.

20101225040335.000|20101225040336.000|CC1|OFFICERS CAREFULLY SCAN THE ROOM
20101225040336.000|20101225040336.000|CC1|FOR ANY SIGNS OF TROUBLE.

20101225040337.000|20101225040338.000|CC1|AT THE CAFETERIA REALLY WELL    
20101225040338.000|20101225040341.000|CC1|BECAUSE WE WERE RIGHT IN THE    
20101225040341.000|20101225040347.000|CC1|MIDDLE OF IT.

20101225040349.000|20101225040350.000|CC1|CARE TAKEN AT THE TIME TO KEEP  
20101225040350.000|20101225040351.000|CC1|US OUT OF THE LINE OF FIRE.     
20101225040351.000|20101225040352.000|CC1|SO WE WERE RIGHT IN THE MIDDLE  
20101225040352.000|20101225040353.000|CC1|OF IT.                          
20101225040353.000|20101225040354.000|CC1|THAT WAS KIND OF A TENSE THING. 
20101225040354.000|20101225040356.000|CC1|>> AS THE FIRST GROUP OF INMATES
20101225040356.000|20101225040357.000|CC1|FINISHED THEIR MEALS AND BEGAN

20101225040358.000|20101225040358.000|CC1|SOUNDS.

20101225040359.000|20101225040400.000|CC1|DISTURBANCE NEAR THE CHOW HALL. 
20101225040400.000|20101225040401.000|CC1|>> GET OUT OF THE WAY, STEP     
20101225040401.000|20101225040402.000|CC1|BACK.                           
20101225040402.000|20101225040405.000|CC1|>> FOLLOWING PROTOCOL, INMATES  
20101225040405.000|20101225040406.000|CC1|ON THE YARD HIT THE GROUND AND  
20101225040406.000|20101225040407.000|CC1|THOSE IN THE CAFETERIA TAKE     
20101225040407.000|20101225040409.000|CC1|THEIR SEATS AS OFFICERS SPRINT  
20101225040409.000|20101225040410.000|CC1|TO THE SCENE.

20101225040412.000|20101225040413.000|CC1|EVERYBODY HIT THE DECK.         
20101225040413.000|20101225040415.000|CC1|SURE ENOUGH, THEY FOUND A WEAPON
20101225040415.000|20101225040416.000|CC1|AND WE WERE RIGHT IN THE MIDDLE 
20101225040416.000|20101225040417.000|CC1|OF IT.                          
20101225040417.000|20101225040418.000|CC1|>> OFFICERS CATCH A GANG MEMBER 
20101225040418.000|20101225040419.000|CC1|ATTEMPTING TO CONCEAL A SHANK, A
20101225040419.000|20101225040420.000|CC1|HOMEMADE SLASHING WEAPON.

20101225040421.000|20101225040423.000|CC1|BUT NOWHERE IS GANG INFLUENCE   
20101225040423.000|20101225040425.000|CC1|MORE PREVALENT THAN OUT ON THE  
20101225040425.000|20101225040428.000|CC1|REC YARDS OF CALIFORNIA'S       
20101225040428.000|20101225040429.000|CC1|PRISONS.                        
20101225040429.000|20101225040431.000|CC1|>> THIS IS A TURF WAR HERE.     
20101225040431.000|20101225040434.000|CC1|EVERYBODY'S GOT THEIR OWN TURF  
20101225040434.000|20101225040435.000|CC1|AND THEY'RE NOT GOING TO LET    
20101225040435.000|20101225040438.000|CC1|ANYBODY ELSE TAKE IT FROM THEM. 
20101225040438.000|20101225040440.000|CC1|THE INMATES SEGREGATE THEMSELVES
20101225040440.000|20101225040441.000|CC1|OUT HERE.                       
20101225040441.000|20101225040442.000|CC1|THE GANGS WANT IT THAT WAY.     
20101225040442.000|20101225040443.000|CC1|A MAN HAS NO CHOICE BUT TO GO   
20101225040443.000|20101225040444.000|CC1|WITH HIS OWN TYPE OF PEOPLE.    
20101225040444.000|20101225040445.000|CC1|>> THE GANGS THINK THEY RUN THE 
20101225040445.000|20101225040448.000|CC1|PRISONS AND THE CORRECTIONAL    
20101225040448.000|20101225040449.000|CC1|OFFICERS THINK THEY RUN THE     
20101225040449.000|20101225040450.000|CC1|PRISON.                         
20101225040450.000|20101225040450.000|CC1|BUT EVERYBODY GANGS UP BY RACE  
20101225040450.000|20101225040452.000|CC1|AND YOU HAVE TO KNOW WHERE      
20101225040452.000|20101225040453.000|CC1|YOU'RE GOING.                   
20101225040453.000|20101225040456.000|CC1|YOU WANT TO GO WALKING INTO THE 
20101225040456.000|20101225040457.000|CC1|WRONG AREA OF THE PRISON YARD   
20101225040457.000|20101225040459.000|CC1|BECAUSE YOU'RE ON SOMEBODY      
20101225040459.000|20101225040500.000|CC1|ELSE'S TURF.                    
20101225040500.000|20101225040502.000|CC1|>> WHILE INMATES CAN SEGREGATE  
20101225040502.000|20101225040504.000|CC1|THEMSELVES IN PRISON, IT'S NOT  
20101225040504.000|20101225040505.000|CC1|ALWAYS THAT WAY IN COUNTY JAIL. 
20101225040505.000|20101225040508.000|CC1|THE FIRST STOP ON THE OFTEN LONG
20101225040508.000|20101225040509.000|CC1|ROAD OF INCARCERATION FOR GANG  
20101225040509.000|20101225040510.000|CC1|MEMBERS.                        
20101225040510.000|20101225040512.000|CC1|>> EVERY GANG IN LOS ANGELES    
20101225040512.000|20101225040514.000|CC1|COUNTY ENDS UP COMING HERE.     
20101225040514.000|20101225040516.000|CC1|AND WE JUST DON'T HAVE ENOUGH   
20101225040516.000|20101225040518.000|CC1|PLACES TO SEGREGATE EVERYBODY   
20101225040518.000|20101225040520.000|CC1|AND KEEP THEM FROM ASSAULTING   
20101225040520.000|20101225040520.000|CC1|EACH OTHER.                     
20101225040520.000|20101225040521.000|CC1|AND IF YOU GET ONE GROUP THAT   
20101225040521.000|20101225040522.000|CC1|HAS SUPERIOR NUMBERS OVER THE   
20101225040522.000|20101225040522.000|CC1|OTHER AND SOMETHING SPARKS OFF A
20101225040522.000|20101225040525.000|CC1|FIGHT, IT'S GOING TO BE ON.     
20101225040525.000|20101225040527.000|CC1|>> OFFICIALS AT THE LOS ANGELES 
20101225040527.000|20101225040528.000|CC1|COUNTY JAIL TOLD US RACIALLY    
20101225040528.000|20101225040530.000|CC1|SEGREGATED GANGS ARE RESPONSIBLE
20101225040530.000|20101225040533.000|CC1|FOR MOST OF THE VIOLENCE        
20101225040533.000|20101225040541.000|CC1|INCLUDING RIOTS, LIKE THIS ONE  
20101225040541.000|20101225040544.000|CC1|CAPTURED ON SURVEILLANCE TAPE.  
20101225040544.000|20101225040547.000|CC1|BUT WE MET ONE INMATE WHO BLAMES
20101225040547.000|20101225040551.000|CC1|THE PROBLEM ON THE SYSTEM.      
20101225040551.000|20101225040557.000|CC1|>> I NEVER WANTED TO GET        
20101225040557.000|20101225040601.000|CC1|INVOLVED IN RACIAL PROBLEMS.    
20101225040601.000|20101225040604.000|CC1|WHEN I WENT TO PRISON, I DIDN'T 
20101225040604.000|20101225040607.000|CC1|HATE BLACKS.                    
20101225040607.000|20101225040609.000|CC1|I DIDN'T HATE MEXICANS.

20101225040612.000|20101225040615.000|CC1|LIKE THAT.                      
20101225040615.000|20101225040617.000|CC1|BUT WHEN YOU GO TO THESE PRISONS
20101225040617.000|20101225040618.000|CC1|AND BY THE TIME YOU DO TEN YEARS
20101225040618.000|20101225040619.000|CC1|LIKE ME, IF YOU'RE EVEN HALFWAY 
20101225040619.000|20101225040622.000|CC1|SANE, IT'S A MIRACLE.           
20101225040622.000|20101225040624.000|CC1|>> HE WAS AWAITING TRIAL FOR THE
20101225040624.000|20101225040626.000|CC1|ATTEMPTED MURDER OF FIVE POLICE 
20101225040626.000|20101225040629.000|CC1|OFFICERS.                       
20101225040629.000|20101225040631.000|CC1|WHILE ON PAROLE FOR AN EARLIER  
20101225040631.000|20101225040632.000|CC1|CONVICTION OF VOLUNTARY         
20101225040632.000|20101225040633.000|CC1|MANSLAUGHTER.                   
20101225040633.000|20101225040636.000|CC1|.                               
20101225040636.000|20101225040637.000|CC1|>> IT WAS LIKE MEETING HANNIBAL 
20101225040637.000|20101225040639.000|CC1|LECTER.                         
20101225040639.000|20101225040640.000|CC1|I SAW ALL THE TATTOOS.          
20101225040640.000|20101225040643.000|CC1|THIS GUY WAS HUGE, 6'3",        
20101225040643.000|20101225040646.000|CC1|PROBABLY ABOUT 235.             
20101225040646.000|20101225040648.000|CC1|HE'S BUILT LIKE AN NFL          
20101225040648.000|20101225040652.000|CC1|LINEBACKER.                     
20101225040652.000|20101225040653.000|CC1|HE LOOKED LIKE A STONE COLD     
20101225040653.000|20101225040655.000|CC1|KILLER.                         
20101225040655.000|20101225040656.000|CC1|WHAT'S EVEN MORE FASCINATING IS 
20101225040656.000|20101225040700.000|CC1|WHAT CAME OUT OF HIS MOUTH.     
20101225040700.000|20101225040702.000|CC1|>> THE CALIFORNIA DEPARTMENT OF 
20101225040702.000|20101225040703.000|CC1|CORRECTIONS IS SOLELY           
20101225040703.000|20101225040704.000|CC1|RESPONSIBLE FOR THE MADNESS THAT
20101225040704.000|20101225040707.000|CC1|GOES ON IN THIS PRISON SYSTEM.  
20101225040707.000|20101225040710.000|CC1|WHEN A BIG WHITE BOY LIKE ME    
20101225040710.000|20101225040712.000|CC1|GOES TO PRISON, HE IS EXPECTED  
20101225040712.000|20101225040713.000|CC1|TO DO HIS PART FOR THE WHITE    
20101225040713.000|20101225040714.000|CC1|CAUSE AND IT'S THE SAME FOR THE 
20101225040714.000|20101225040716.000|CC1|BLACK, THE MEXICANS, THE        
20101225040716.000|20101225040717.000|CC1|INDIANS, THE ORIENTAL, ASIAN,   
20101225040717.000|20101225040719.000|CC1|EVERYBODY ELSE.                 
20101225040719.000|20101225040721.000|CC1|THEY'RE EXPECTED TO GO TO PRISON
20101225040721.000|20101225040723.000|CC1|AND DO THEIR PART.

20101225040727.000|20101225040729.000|CC1|BECAUSE THE INMATES WHO RUN THE 
20101225040729.000|20101225040730.000|CC1|PRISON ARE THE INMATES DOING

20101225040739.000|20101225040742.000|CC1|LIFE WITHOUT, THEY'RE HOPELESS.

20101225041126.000|20101225041127.000|CC1|SITS IN NEAR PRISTINE WILDERNESS
20101225041127.000|20101225041128.000|CC1|ON THE COASTLINE OF NORTHERN    
20101225041128.000|20101225041134.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA.                     
20101225041134.000|20101225041137.000|CC1|>> WE'RE LOCATED JUST MILES FROM
20101225041137.000|20101225041140.000|CC1|THE OREGON BORDER JUST IN FROM  
20101225041140.000|20101225041140.000|CC1|THE COAST.                      
20101225041140.000|20101225041142.000|CC1|SO WE'RE FAIRLY REMOTE.         
20101225041142.000|20101225041143.000|CC1|WE'RE NOT SURROUNDED BY NOTHING.
20101225041143.000|20101225041145.000|CC1|>> IT'S NO ACCIDENT THAT PELICAN
20101225041145.000|20101225041145.000|CC1|BAY IS ISOLATED HUNDREDS OF     
20101225041145.000|20101225041146.000|CC1|MILES FROM THE STATE'S MAJOR    
20101225041146.000|20101225041146.000|CC1|CITIES.                         
20101225041146.000|20101225041149.000|CC1|>> WE FIGHT AN UNENDING BATTLE  
20101225041149.000|20101225041150.000|CC1|TO KEEP THE COMMUNICATION FROM  
20101225041150.000|20101225041157.000|CC1|OUR SECURITY HOUSING UNIT       
20101225041157.000|20101225041158.000|CC1|INMATES, PARTICULARLY OUR       
20101225041158.000|20101225041159.000|CC1|GANGSTER, FROM GETTING BACK OUT 
20101225041159.000|20101225041200.000|CC1|TO THE STREETS AND OUT OF OUR   
20101225041200.000|20101225041201.000|CC1|1,100 INMATES, OVER 800 HAVE    
20101225041201.000|20101225041202.000|CC1|BEEN VALIDATED AS GANG MEMBERS  
20101225041202.000|20101225041203.000|CC1|OR ASSOCIATES.                  
20101225041203.000|20101225041206.000|CC1|>> PELICAN BAY IS THE TOUGHEST  
20101225041206.000|20101225041207.000|CC1|PRISON IN THE CALIFORNIA PRISON 
20101225041207.000|20101225041210.000|CC1|SYSTEM.                         
20101225041210.000|20101225041213.000|CC1|THE FIRST TIME WE SENT A        
20101225041213.000|20101225041215.000|CC1|"LOCKUP" CREW WAS WEEKS AFTER   
20101225041215.000|20101225041219.000|CC1|THEY SUFFERED THEIR WORST GANG  
20101225041219.000|20101225041221.000|CC1|RIOT IN HISTORY.                
20101225041221.000|20101225041223.000|CC1|AND THERE WAS STILL TENSION AS  
20101225041223.000|20101225041225.000|CC1|THE CREW WALKED THROUGH THE

20101225041229.000|20101225041231.000|CC1|>> THE RIOT FOUGHT PRIMARILY

20101225041233.000|20101225041234.000|CC1|INMATES LASTED A LITTLE OVER 30 
20101225041234.000|20101225041235.000|CC1|MINUTES.                        
20101225041235.000|20101225041236.000|CC1|ONE INMATE WAS KILLED AND DOZENS
20101225041236.000|20101225041238.000|CC1|OF OTHERS WERE STABBED OR       
20101225041238.000|20101225041239.000|CC1|BEATEN.

20101225041240.000|20101225041240.000|CC1|PALPABLE.                       
20101225041240.000|20101225041241.000|CC1|>> ONE OF THE INTERESTING THINGS
20101225041241.000|20101225041242.000|CC1|ABOUT PELICAN BAY IS THERE      
20101225041242.000|20101225041243.000|CC1|SEEMED TO BE TWO SYSTEMS OF     
20101225041243.000|20101225041245.000|CC1|RULES, THE PRISON ADMINISTRATION
20101225041245.000|20101225041245.000|CC1|AND THEN THE RULES OF THE GANGS.
20101225041245.000|20101225041251.000|CC1|AND THERE'S THIS CONSTANT

20101225041253.000|20101225041254.000|CC1|THEY HAVE TRAINED THEMSELVES    
20101225041254.000|20101225041254.000|CC1|MENTALLY, PHYSICALLY FOR A

20101225041258.000|20101225041301.000|CC1|IT FEELS LIKE A WARTIME PRISON, 
20101225041301.000|20101225041304.000|CC1|PELICAN BAY.                    
20101225041304.000|20101225041306.000|CC1|>> CORRECTIONAL STAFF TOLD US   
20101225041306.000|20101225041308.000|CC1|THAT WHEN IT COMES TO BATTLING

20101225042137.000|20101225042142.000|CC1|>> CALIFORNIA STATE PRISON      
20101225042142.000|20101225042146.000|CC1|CORCORAN HAS THE LARGEST NUMBER 
20101225042146.000|20101225042146.000|CC1|OF DANGEROUS INMATES ON THE WEST
20101225042146.000|20101225042148.000|CC1|COAST.                          
20101225042148.000|20101225042149.000|CC1|CORRECTIONAL STAFF IS BLUNT     
20101225042149.000|20101225042150.000|CC1|ABOUT THE DANGER.               
20101225042150.000|20101225042156.000|CC1|>> WHEN TALKING TO THE COs AT   
20101225042156.000|20101225042156.000|CC1|CORCORAN, THEY TOLD ME, YOU COME
20101225042156.000|20101225042157.000|CC1|IN HERE, YOU HAVE TO JOIN A GANG
20101225042157.000|20101225042159.000|CC1|FOR PROTECTION.                 
20101225042159.000|20101225042200.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU COME TO PRISON, YOU 
20101225042200.000|20101225042200.000|CC1|HAVE TO JOIN A GANG.            
20101225042200.000|20101225042203.000|CC1|YOU HAVE NO CHOICE.             
20101225042203.000|20101225042204.000|CC1|IT'S A MUST.                    
20101225042204.000|20101225042207.000|CC1|>> THE PRISON CANNOT PROTECT YOU
20101225042207.000|20101225042209.000|CC1|FROM THE OTHER INMATES.         
20101225042209.000|20101225042212.000|CC1|IT'S AN INCREDIBLE ADMISSION.   
20101225042212.000|20101225042212.000|CC1|>> SO YOU HAVE TO HAVE THAT     
20101225042212.000|20101225042213.000|CC1|BACK-UP FROM YOUR OTHER RACES   
20101225042213.000|20101225042214.000|CC1|THAT ARE OUT HERE, WHATEVER RACE
20101225042214.000|20101225042215.000|CC1|BACKS YOU UP, YOU NEED TO BE IN 
20101225042215.000|20101225042217.000|CC1|THEIR GANG BECAUSE YOU HAVE NO  
20101225042217.000|20101225042220.000|CC1|PROTECTION.                     
20101225042220.000|20101225042221.000|CC1|YOU'RE ON YOUR OWN AND ANYTHING 
20101225042221.000|20101225042222.000|CC1|CAN HAPPEN TO YOU.              
20101225042222.000|20101225042223.000|CC1|>> CORRECTIONAL OFFICERS KNOW   
20101225042223.000|20101225042224.000|CC1|ANYTHING CAN HAPPEN TO THEM AS  
20101225042224.000|20101225042228.000|CC1|WELL.

20101225042232.000|20101225042234.000|CC1|GANGS CAN REACH OUTSIDE THESE   
20101225042234.000|20101225042236.000|CC1|WALLS, IT MAY HOLD THEM IN, BUT 
20101225042236.000|20101225042239.000|CC1|IT DOESN'T HOLD IN THEIR POWER, 
20101225042239.000|20101225042240.000|CC1|THE THINGS THEY CAN DO.         
20101225042240.000|20101225042241.000|CC1|I KEEP MY FAMILY BUSINESS TO    
20101225042241.000|20101225042243.000|CC1|MYSELF.

20101225042247.000|20101225042248.000|CC1|KNOWN TO HANG OUT.              
20101225042248.000|20101225042250.000|CC1|I AVOID THOSE LOCATIONS.

20101225042252.000|20101225042256.000|CC1|OFFICERS IS WHEN WE KNOW THERE'S

20101225042302.000|20101225042304.000|CC1|GOING TO BE LARGE, SMALL.

20101225042308.000|20101225042308.000|CC1|GOING TO HAPPEN BETWEEN THEM.

20101225042309.000|20101225042310.000|CC1|AND PICK UP THE PIECES.

20101225042311.000|20101225042315.000|CC1|ABOUT 12 COs ON THE YARD, 500
